de.weltraumschaf.commons.system

Interface Exitable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultExiter, ExitableAdapter, NullExiter

    public interface Exitable
    An exitable gives the interface to exit an program w/o calling System.exit(int) directly.
    Author:
    Sven Strittmatter

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void exit(ExitCode status)
      Exits the program.
      void exit(int status)
      Exits the program.
